title: Identify Abandoned E-Scooter
description: A shared e-scooter has not moved in 72 hours, indicating it may be lost, stolen, or broken. An operator must investigate.

tasks.description: Receive an alert for an e-scooter that has been stationary for more than 72 hours.
Retrieve the scooter's last known GPS location and battery level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the location and sees the battery is dead.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field technician to retrieve the abandoned scooter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a task for the micromobility provider's field team.
